div.p: Running short of meaningfull text, I turn to some quotes copied from . It may not be correct to use footnotes for translation, it may be "Ad absurdum"To the point of absurdity, but it looks fine. Like for instance "Extra ecclesiam nulla salus" Outside the Church [there is] No Salvation. (A phrase of much disputed significance in Roman Catholic theology) could be used in many situations outside the church.
Or if ypu are a teacher you could of course tell your students "Aut disce aut discede"Either learn or leave, as you have always wanted.
